title: Aadhya Diamond & Pink Sapphire Kasulaperu Inspired Necklace
materials: Crafted in 18K Yellow Gold with Hyderabadi Polish. Features brilliant-cut Diamonds (VS Clarity
G-H Color) and oval-shaped Pink Sapphires. Gold-plated rope chain.
features: This stunning necklace draws inspiration from the traditional Kasulaperu design, reimagined with a modern aesthetic. The intricately designed floral motifs are studded with sparkling diamonds and accented with royal blue enamel detailing. Pink sapphire drops add a touch of feminine elegance. The open-setting allows maximum light to enhance the brilliance of the diamonds. Features floral motifs, delicate filigree details.
colors: accented with pink (sapphires) and subtle blue detailing. A regal yet feminine palette perfect for special occasions.
occasions: and other celebratory events. A perfect statement piece for muhurtham ceremonies
description: A unique fusion of traditional South Indian design and modern jewelry aesthetics. The high-quality diamonds and pink sapphires offer exceptional sparkle and elegance. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a long-lasting, radiant finish. This necklace is a timeless heirloom that can be passed down through generations. The open setting maximizes the sparkle of the diamonds.
